credit_line: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
title: Textile samples
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft (brocade) on georgette
description: Six samples of georgette crepe, in solid colors with brocaded design. Angular stems with ornamental leaves in gold. Separate sprays of fruit and blossoms in silver. Both selvedges present on all samples.
name: Textile samples
